name: ak-accessories
features: Login, Logout, registration, backend CRUD operation and admin panel. Customer can order parts, delete order, see his/her orders, confirmation toast, private routes, and etc. Admin can make any admin, add parts, handle orders. Responsive design for mobile, tablet, and large screen display.
front_end: HTML5, CSS3, twailwind css, daisyui, Javascript, ReactJs
back_end: NodeJs, expressJs, MongoDB(database), JWT, firebase authentication, firebasehosting (client-side deploy), heroku (server-side deploy).

name: e-warehouse
features: Responsive design for mobile, tablet, and large screen. Login, logout, registration, Email verification, private routes, confirmation toast and etc. Store product, delete product, update product, see your stored products.
back_end: NodeJs, expressJs, MongoDB(database), JWT, firebase authentication, firebasehosting (client-side deploy), heroku (server-side deploy).

name: Photographer Guy
features: This is Photographer portfolio. It is a SPA React app. It has been desigened with Bootstrap-5. Anyone can signin and register on this site with email and password also with google as well as social site. And check photographer price according to the category. If someone wants to contact with photographer, he/she can contact trough fill up a contact page!
front_end: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap-5, JavaScipt, ReactJs, firebase authentication for login authentication and deploy

name: Tech Analytica
features: This is simple responsice design with Bootstrap-5. Line chart and bar chart have been used on this site. It has few reviews inside bootstrap card and shows with conditional rendering
front_end: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap-5, JavaScript, ReactJs, Axios and netlify for deploy
